text: Mavelikkara is a town in Alappuzha district, Kerala, India. Mavelikkara may also refer to: * Mavelikara (Lok Sabha constituency), a constituency in Kerala ==People== * Mavelikkara Krishnankutty Nair (1920–1988), Carnatic Mridangam player * Mavelikkara Velukkutty Nair, Indian mridangam player * Mavelikkara S. R. Raju, Carnatic music percussionist * Mavelikkara Prabhakara Varma (1928–2008), Indian carnatic singer
title: Mavelikkara (disambiguation)
